[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@jsplumb/browser-ui](./browser-ui.md) &gt; [BrowserJsPlumbInstance](./browser-ui.browserjsplumbinstance.md) &gt; [addToDragGroup](./browser-ui.browserjsplumbinstance.addtodraggroup.md)

## BrowserJsPlumbInstance.addToDragGroup() method

Adds the given element(s) to the given drag group.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addToDragGroup(spec: DragGroupSpec, ...els: Array<Element>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  spec | [DragGroupSpec](./browser-ui.draggroupspec.md) | Either the ID of some drag group, in which case the elements are all added as 'active', or an object of the form { id:"someId", active:boolean }<!-- -->. In the latter case, <code>active</code>, if true, which is the default, indicates whether dragging the given element(s) should cause all the elements in the drag group to be dragged. If <code>active</code> is false it means the given element(s) is "passive" and should only move when an active member of the drag group is dragged. |
|  els | Array&lt;Element&gt; | Elements to add to the drag group. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
